body:
Ok, I found the problem (with the help of @fmassa). the `sum` has an `expand` in the backwards which makes the `grad_output` into the batch norm non-contiguous. This is related to issue #603 as there are no contiguous checks in the cudnn path (and no calls to make the `grad_output` contiguous). 

I'll send a PR for this, this week.
